lunarEmpire.math

Class Radical

  • java.lang.Object
    • lunarEmpire.math.Radical

  • public class Radical
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that simplifies all radicals.

    Class takes input as an inner number, outter number, and an index where it simplifies these numbers in the constructor. To use the class create a new instance and call the getSimpInNum() and getSimpOutNum() methods which will return the simplified values of the radical.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Malcolm Boyd
